text: Ziyad Saeed Al-Kord bin Samir, known simply as Ziyad Al-Kord (; born 15 January 1974 in Gaza), is a Palestinian footballer who has played with various clubs in the Palestinian territories, Jordan, and Saudi Arabia. He is Palestine's second all-time leading scorer behind Fahed Attal with 10 goals in 30 games. He is the first Palestinian player to have played professionally in Saudi Arabia. ==International goals== :Scores and results list the Palestine's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%" ! # !!
